replies.body: Yeah, not a lot different to Windows 8 from what I've heard.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, not a lot different to Windows 8 from what I've heard.

replies.body: +1 since I'm on Windows 10, I'm getting a little bit more FPS and it feels a Little bit faster than on Windows 7, probably because of the new DirextX-thing (I don't really know much about DirectX so I don't know why it's faster) but Windows 10 has much more other cool features and is a little bit faster than the other windows' so I'd give a +1.<br id="null"><br id="null">But if you don't need to update, then simply don't l0l<br id="null">

replies.body: Um, YES! This is the last windows update ever (windows is now a service), and it is highly improved over Win8, and search it up MaximumPC's website if you need more reasons. They have a whole article.

replies.body: I'd say wait a few more days/weeks before updating and look at some reviews or something.  I got Win10 and it has been nice so far but a lot of programs I use don't work.
